title: FS: N172 Scott Stratton SGC 45 asking 600.00
author: wacturner

posts.post_title: FS: N172 Scott Stratton SGC 45 asking 600.00
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I have a N172 Scott Stratton Louisville graded sgc 45 for sale. I am asking $600.00 for it.  Please message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url] if you want scans/are interested.  Thanks for your time.  I will also consider trade for winchester t210 series 6 cards for this item as well.

William Turner
